Module io.jstach.jstachio
Package io.jstach.jstachio.output

Interface ChunkEncodedOutput<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the chunk type
All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, BufferedEncodedOutput, Output<RuntimeException>, Output.CloseableEncodedOutput<RuntimeException>, Output.EncodedOutput<RuntimeException>
public non-sealed interface ChunkEncodedOutput<T> extends BufferedEncodedOutput
Maintains the encoded output in an iterable of chunks of type T that is optimized for BufferedEncodedOutput.asReadableByteChannel().
Author:
agentgt

      Returns:

    • bufferSizeHint

      int bufferSizeHint()
      For chunk output the buffer hint is usually the size of the largest chunk. The recommend buffer size to use for extracting with BufferedEncodedOutput.asReadableByteChannel() or BufferedEncodedOutput.transferTo(OutputStream).
      Specified by:
      bufferSizeHint in interface BufferedEncodedOutput
      Returns:
      buffer size to use which by default is BufferedEncodedOutput.size().
